Class HighScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • HighScore
  • public class HighScore
extends java.lang.Object
    Class HighScore is the manager of the totalwins.dat and highscores.dat files which store the info for the total scores of every game in the two player mode game and the 10 best scores in the one player mode game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

      private java.lang.String onePlayerModeFile  
      private java.util.ArrayList<Player> totalWins

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void gameEnded​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      Method gameEnded accepts an arrayList of players.
      void gameStarted()
      Method gameStarted loads the data from the onePlayerModeFile and the towPlayerModeFile
      java.lang.String[] getHighestScores()
      Method getHighestScore returns a String array that contains the data of the highest scores in the one player mode game.
      java.lang.String[] getTotalWins()
      Method getTotalWins returns a String array that contains the total wins data in the tow player mode game.
      private void loadHighestScoresFromFile​(java.lang.String file2)
      Method leadHighestScoresFromFile accepts a string that represents the name of a file and loads the data of the tow player mode game, from the file to the correct data structure.
      private void loadTotalWinsFromFile​(java.lang.String file1)
      Method loadTotalWinsFromFile accepts a string that represents the name of a file and loads the data of the total wins to the tow player mode game to, form the file to the correct data structure.
      private void saveHighestScoresToFile​(java.lang.String file2)
      Method saveHighestScoresToFile accepts a string that represents the name of a file and saves the data of the highest scores in the one player mode game to that file.
      private void saveTotalWinsToFile​(java.lang.String file1)
      Method saveTotalWinsToFile accepts a string that represents the name of a file and stores the data form the total wins of the tow player mode game to that file.

      • HighScore

        public HighScore​(java.lang.String onePlayerModeFile,
                 java.lang.String towPlayerModeFile)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        onePlayerModeFile - file for the 10 best scores
        towPlayerModeFile - file for the total plays

    • Method Detail

      • gameStarted

        public void gameStarted()
        Method gameStarted loads the data from the onePlayerModeFile and the towPlayerModeFile

      • gameEnded

        public void gameEnded​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
        Method gameEnded accepts an arrayList of players. If we are at the one player mode it changes the onePlayerModeFile accordingly. If we are at the tow player mode it stores the players to the towPlayerModeFile.
        Parameters:
        players - ArrayList of Players

      • saveTotalWinsToFile

        private void saveTotalWinsToFile​(java.lang.String file1)
        Method saveTotalWinsToFile accepts a string that represents the name of a file and stores the data form the total wins of the tow player mode game to that file.
        Parameters:
        file1 - String

      • loadTotalWinsFromFile

        Parameters:
        file1 - String
